Grammar:    DataElement 6.0
Namespace:  shr.test

Entry: CardConstraintOnValueChild
Description:  "It is an entry with a card constraint on the value's child"
Value:        Simple
Property:     Simple.string 1..2

Entry: CardConstraintOnFieldChild
Description:  "It is a group entry with a card constraint on a field's child"
Property:     Simple 0..1
Property:     Simple2 0..1
Property:     Simple2.string  1..2

Element:        Simple
Value:          string

Element:        Simple2
Value:          string
